amendment.description: To increase the new budget authority in the International Affairs function by $330,000,000 for fiscal year 2005 to provide adequate funding for the Child Survival and Health Program, with a corresponding offset in function 920.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2697 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2697 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2676-2677; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2676) To increase the new budget authority in the International Affairs function by $330,000,000 for fiscal year 2005 to provide adequate funding for the Child Survival and Health Program, with a corresponding offset in function 920.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2697 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2697 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator DeWine.
